title: Grant admin privileges to current user

requirements.text: Ensure the current authenticated user's principal is granted admin privileges in the backend access control system
acceptanceCriteria: The authenticated user's principal is added to the admin list in the backend
Admin privileges are persisted across canister upgrades
The user can access all admin-restricted pages after privileges are granted

requirements.text: Verify that payment configuration (Stripe settings) is visible in the account dashboard for users with admin privileges
acceptanceCriteria: Admin users can see the Stripe settings navigation card in the account dashboard
The Stripe settings card links correctly to the payment settings page
Non-admin users do not see admin-only configuration options

constraints: Use the existing assignAdminPrivileges backend method
Do not modify the Internet Identity authentication flow
nonGoals: Creating a new admin role system
Building a role-based permission hierarchy beyond admin/non-admin
